name: Guns and Dummies
description:
This is heardbyhurd's (Will Hurd's) submission for Trijam #212's 3-hour game jam! This was made solely by Will Hurd. The object of the game is to shoot as many dummies as possible within the 10 second time limit. Try and score as many points as you can! 

WASD to move, Left Click to shoot, Shift to sprint.

I spent roughly 2 hours designing the game itself, and probably 1 hour doing the sound effects. I am a sound designer at heart, so I used several premade assets from both the Unity store and other sources, referenced below. 

Referenced Assets:

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/lowpoly-training-dummy-202311

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/guns/sci-fi-gun-light-87916

- https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/nature/terrain-textu...

- https://jimmyvegas.itch.io/standard-assets
